name: Improbable Missiles
description:
Welcome to Improbable Missiles!

Take control of a super cool laser-cannon on rails to protect your city from missiles' apocalypse!
Guide the cannon left and right and shoot the missiles to morph them into less dangerous stuff to collect and earn points!

  • Missiles
  • Laser Cannon on rails
  • Petunias
  • Sperm Whales
  • Did I say Missiles?
  • High-tech city to save
  • Awesome Soundtrack
  • High Score system
  • More Missiles!

Submitted as an entry for the Spring 2018 UE4 Game Jam!
